Name: John Dory
Review Text: We can't be happier to choose this place for our anniversary dinner! The staff were super nice to prepare the card and decorated the table for us! Such a nice service!! And each dish tasted amazing!! We were pretty full at the end. More than worth paying for! Thank you so much to make our day so special!

Review Text: Great fish dishes. Most of them are really nice. Dessert is also good. But as I am not a wine drinker. They didn't really have a nice alcohol free mocktail.

Name: John Dory
Review Text: I was visiting the town by boat and I took a random photo and this restaurant appears here. It looks nice , next time i plan to make a stop there and taste their fancy food .

Name: John Dory

Name: John Dory
Review Text: Beautifully compose dishes, presented in an appealing way. Great selection of fish dishes and deserts. Every week you can select from a new array of up to 8 course meal, 3 of wish are deserts. Yummy though not cheap

Name: John Dory
Review Text: All courses were so delicious! Great place for different tastes and special days. The ambiance and service were very good.

Review Text:

Manager called me back, asked about it personally and solved this problem! ‚Ä¶

Name: John Dory
Review Text: We were invited to John Dory by friends for Sunday special breakfast (they are usually closed but try a booking for last Sunday of the month). You have a menu to chose from (25-100euros, 3-10 dishes). ‚Ä¶

Name: John Dory
Review Text: Absolutely outstanding! My partner and I were taken here last night by a friend who lives in Amsterdam and it was honestly the highlight of our time. The quality of the food was outstanding and the service was fantastic! We are so grateful ‚Ä¶

Review Text: John Dory makes Incredibly delicious dishes, which are beautifully presented. They have a great wine selection aswell. The staff is very kind, attentive and knowledgeable. All this combined with a beautiful cozy/chic interior. If you like fish this restaurant should be on your bucket list.

Name: John Dory
Review Text: One of my favourite places to be in Amsterdam. Food is great, wine is great beers are also good. Not the best place for a celebration with a big amount of people, but great for a couple or four people. ‚Ä¶

Name: John Dory
Review Text: All of excitement, fascination, creativity -- AND one big disappointment --packed into one dinner. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Never expected to enjoy a five course fish only dinner. Great staff and lovely setting.

Review Text: Above expectation. Plus points: Delicous food, very friendly and helpful personal, nice presentation of food. Never heard about a fish maccaron but it was sweet and amazing. Minus points it is a bit expensive and they forgot to remove the ‚Ä¶

Name: John Dory
Review Text: Great evening out. We were lucky to sit at the window table, so we could enjoy the scenery of the Amsterdam canals. The dishes are original, light and super tasty. Good chef (who welcomed us in and said goodby). Am I lyrical? Absolutely.

Name: John Dory
Review Text: Wonderful selection of creative, delicious fish dishes. Sweet, personal and attentive waitering. Definitely will visit again. Where's the 6 star button?

Name: John Dory
Review Text: We went there for our 7th anniversary and got the 10 courses blind menu. It was delicious. If you are a fish lover, make a reservation right away.

Name: John Dory
Review Text: Had better experience here previously. Came with work colleagues in December and was fantastic. Brought my husband on a subsequent leisure trip and was disappointed. Food still good but very very slow to be served and one male host seemed disinterested. Sadly I thought I found my 'go to' but now unlikely to return

Name: John Dory
Review Text: Simply amazing place. High quality food, excellent service. What surprised me a lot was the accuracy in serving dishes, always at perfect temperature and at the right time.

Name: John Dory
Review Text: Very good gastronomic experience! We took the 6 courses options and every dish were delicious! Staff very polite! Thank you for accepting my little dog at your restaurant.

Name: John Dory
Review Text: we went here with a bunch of people from work and had a special four-course a tasting. Mainly fish oriented, but everything was really special. Wonderful place, excellent service, will definitely come back.

Name: John Dory
Review Text: Simply one of the best restaurants in Amsterdam. We tried the 4 course meal and weren't disappointed. The quality is amazing and has a service to match. Great experience.

Name: John Dory
Review Text: One of my favorite restaurants in the world. Amazing service, atmosphere and certainly food. If you happen to be in Amsterdam, you can't miss the chance to go to John Dory! ‚Ä¶
